com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.exception

Class LocationProviderNotFoundException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.exception.LocationProviderNotFoundException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LocationProviderNotFoundException
extends java.lang.Exception
    This exception is raised when the weather client can't find the right Location provider.
    Author:
    Francesco Azzola
